trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around October 2nd 2010
divs: sighting detailsi was hanging out with the neighborhood kids in front of my driveway laying down listening to solar fields - air song(ambient space music) on full blast on my computer speakers i had set up outside just having a great day, relaxing and socializing when i caught a glimpse of an odd white dot in the sky silently ripping across the sky headed south at an incredible speed. i had pointed it out the them, (they couldn't believe their eyes either) and amidst our confusion, it just disappeared out of plain sight...needless to say we were a bit freaked out...i kept telling myself it was a piece of drifting cottonwood in the air, but the next sighting completely knocked that idea out of the picture... about 10 minutes later we managed to calm down a little, the kids went back to playing around, i kept looking up and around laying down on my back, when i noticed another one flying south at i guess 3500-4000 miles an hour, and it disappeared behind the white haze in the air(it was a clear blue skied day with a wierd fuzzy white haze in the air, possibly the effect of aerosol chemtrail spraying) this happened over and over again in 10, 15 and sometimes 20 minute intervals apart, one craft at a time, and at some points in between i caught "blinks?" of the same crafts zipping in and out of sight like they were exiting and reentering some kind of portal in the atmosphere...it happened so fast that i had to ask one of the kids if they saw it too and indeed they did,(some were still watching the sky with me) so that confirmed that it wasn't just me who witnessed it...it got so bad that i had to go and get my pellet gun to look through my scope to get a better look, and it helped me to not misidentify a regular aircraft from a ufo, and to my best effort, i couldnt spot one in time before they dissapeared(they did that quite a lot) i had also taken note of the local regular aircrafts' cruising speed and altitude and they were nowhere near the speed\altitude of these said crafts...it almost dumbfounded me that i was witnessing such a phenomenon and i almost couldn't believe myself and what i was seeing, nonetheless i did see a ufo...and it was just about the most unsettling thing i have ever seen in my life, yet one of the most exiting and liberating things i have ever witnessed.
Object Shape: Chevron, Sphere, Teardrop, Triangle, Other, Unknown
Summary: a sighting in kennedale with winesses of a white dot UFO
